original_text: but have stubbornly followed their own hearts and have gone after the Baals, as their fathers taught them.
korean_text: 그 마음의 완악함을 따라 그 조상들이 자기에게 가르친 바알들을 따랐음이라

sentences.original_text: but have stubbornly followed their own hearts
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 고집스럽게 자기 마음을 따랐습니다

sentences.original_text: and have gone after the Baals
